name: MzDesigns Game
description:
Take a short break from the Dhilly Game series to see the death of MzDesigns on his goal to DhillyHub!

(this is a spinoff of the dhilly game series, feel free to check it out on my profile if you're interested in the series)

Check out the hilarious Dhilly Game discord server - https://discord.gg/Hd7tYP2Vyh

Original Dhilly Game site - https://sites.google.com/view/dhillygamecollection/

And for more builds of the game please check out the game on Gamejolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/dhilly3/642084
